name: Common
desc: A common modification that probably hurts your vessel.

name: Uncommon
desc: An uncommon modification that neither improves nor degrades your ship's capabilities.

name: Rare
desc: A rare modification that enhances your vessel's performance.

name: Legendary
desc: A legendary modification that greatly improves your ship.

name: Mythic
desc: A mythic modification of unparalleled power.

name: Roll the Gacha
desc:
Roll the gacha, and add a random hullmod to your ship! First hit's free, though removing it to roll again will cost you.

Rates are: 1 star (%s), 2 star (%s), 3 star (%s), 4 star (%s), 5 star (%s). Pretty generous, right? Usually the 5 star rate is %s!

1 stars will give you a negative effect, 2 stars give nothing, 3 stars give a positive effect, 4 stars give a logistic effect, and 5 stars give you a special effect! Aim big! (Disclaimer: Not all effects can be rolled.)

Oh, and to make it more interesting each roll will also give your ship random IVs, shamelessly copied from Pokemon. Each stat will modify the corresponding ship stat by %s to %s depending on the roll. Higher rarities will get slightly better rolls. So you'll need to get doubly lucky to have a good ship!

The stats are: HP (ship hull), ATK (ballistic damage), DEF (armor), SP ATK (energy damage), SP DEF (flux vent/capacity), and SPD (speed, duh).

name: Remove the Gacha
desc:
Remove the gacha so you can roll again! It'll cost you around %s of the value of your ship to remove this. I have to make a living somehow!

May the odds be ever in your favour.
